remarks:
The Cartesian product of two sets is a set.  Proposition 6.2 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 23.  (Contributed by NM, 14-Aug-1994.) 

---

 The cross product of two sets is a set.  Proposition 6.2 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 23.  (Contributed by NM, 14-Aug-1994.)
